body: Saw this in hitomi.la first godly as usual
Well, feels bad for the dad. But they did got close after many time meeting each other when he's helping her father come back home right?

@1nhentai97 I wasn't aware this author had works released on fakku. I just checked and there are two works published on fakku and one of them has proper drawn genitals and the other one has white-out genitals, and what's really weird is the white-out version is the most recent one, you'd think it'd be the other way around. Anyway, I agree it's nice that we're getting drawn genitals.
@softouch have to agree, that one seems kinda wholesome as well lol. But this also looks promising, hope to see translations soon.
The one about mc getting his childhood girl back is still this artist's best work in my opinion.
One of my favorite artists right now, and I'm surprised it's not outright NTR again. @1nhentai97 Why do you say that as if censors are decided by the artist?
Damn, this is great! Taniguchi Daisuke finally drew non-whiteout dick and pussy and it's amazing...

@TrendBreaker Yeah it's a pretty simply story. MC's boss has this daughter that he's really proud of. Boss was so sure that he's done his best to protect her from any man, but little did he know that MC's dating her after one time when girl pretty much seduced him. They like each other so they started dating. The last scene was girl's bday but luckily they didn't get caught. Poor dad but the art's really fucking good here.
Can I get a summary of this one?  Because it looks like a "getting with the bosses daughter" kind of plot.
